content: mini shroom for dolls to hold <3 my name is lauren lewis and you can find me at https //m facebook com/handmadebylaurenlewis/ thank you to tammy simmons for testing find her here https //m facebook com/tamigurumiandmore/ this pattern is massively influenced by crafty intentions mushroom pattern please consider going to buy that pattern along with having this one https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mushroom-sprites please do not copy or sell this pattern or any parts of this pattern 1 starting with stem 6 colour single_crochet 6 in magic_ring 2 increase x 6 12 3 blo single_crochet 12 12 4 single_crochet 12 12 5 single_crochet 2 decrease x 3 9 6 stuff bottom here 9 single_crochet 9 7 single_crochet 1 decrease x 3 6 8 - 15 single_crochet around 6 16 chain 2 flo single_crochet increase in each 12 stitch slip_stitch chain 1 17 chain 2 double_crochet & front post 24 double_crochet slip_stitch to the first double_crochet and fasten_off https //youtu be/dvbwz9dcnyk here is a link to the crafty intentions tutorial of how to do steps 16 and 17 cap pattern 1 in cap colour 4 single_crochet 4 in magic_ring 2 single_crochet 4 4 3 single_crochet 4 4 4 single_crochet 4 4 5 increase single_crochet 3 5 6 single_crochet 5 5 7 increase single_crochet 4 6 8 single_crochet 6 6 9 increase single_crochet 5 7 10 single_crochet 7 7 11 increase single_crochet 6 8 12 single_crochet 8 8 13 increase sc7 9 14 single_crochet 9 9 15 increase 8 10 16 single_crochet 10 10 17 single_crochet 1 increase x 5 15 18 single_crochet 15 15 19 single_crochet 2 increase x 5 20 20 single_crochet 20 20 21 single_crochet 3 increase x 5 25 22 decrease single_crochet 23 24 do not fasten_off continue to attach the top and bottom carry onto next page hold the top and bottom together 1 increase in both the top and bottom layers ar the same time all the way around slip_stitch and fasten off remember to go and get crafty intentions pattern https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mushroom-sprites
